text: Svetlana Alexandrovna Alexievich (born 31 May 1948 in Ukraine) is a Belarusian investigative journalist and non-fiction writer who writes in the Russian language. She won a Nobel Prize in Literature in 2015. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian writers Category:Nobel Prize in Literature winners
title: Svetlana Alexievich
